MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: After our mission in Flamarine, we are unexpectedly stranded in the middle of nowhere, waiting for the military to clean up. However, there's no pressing mission, and we need a vacation. We spend the days off at leisure.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Kuang
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Wow~♪ The circus was so much fun!

Kuang's face breaks into a smile as she stretches widely. We had come to see the most popular circus in Flamarine to reward Kuang for her great achievement on this mission, and it seems to have been a great success.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Kuang
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
Thank you for bringing me here, Conductor.
I've never seen a circus before. The elephant on a ball was amazing!

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Kuang
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
I can't believe that animals and humans can communicate with each other
and give such amazing performances. I'm so impressed.
She mentions the circus acts one by one and comments on them, her face flushing each time. She seems to particularly like the animal tricks.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Kuang
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
The circus reminded me of a monkey
that I used to be good friends with. I hope he's doing well.

Kuang had been spending time with the monkeys on her home island.
But she must have had little time to go home after joining the SSS. If that's the case, it might be a good idea to go and visit now.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Kuang
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Are you sure? Thank you, Conductor!

Kuang smiles the whole way to the island where she was born and raised.
If she's this happy, it seems like an unscheduled stop wasn't a bad idea.

When we manage to cross the steep rocky beach and land on the island, we're welcomed by the gentle sound of waves and the chirping of sea birds. Kuang is so happy to be in her hometown that she's smiling as brightly as the sun.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Kuang
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: The sea breeze feels good...
As we start walking down the road, the sea breeze blowing, we immediately see the tip of the island's lighthouse. That lighthouse must be Kuang's house.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Kuang
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
That's right.
My house can be seen from everywhere on this island.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Kuang
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: And, there are a lot of monkeys around the lighthouse.
Kuang proceeds to look at the lighthouse she speaks.

Then, halfway through, I start to feel a buzzing around me.
Something is surrounding us, but I can't see what because of the thick vegetation.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Kuang
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: They're monkeys. They're wondering what kind of person you are. Hold on a second.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Kuang
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Ooh ooh ah ah!
Kuang stops in her tracks and shouts with her hands out. Then all at once, the monkeys jump out and completely surround us. At a quick glance, there are no less than several dozen of them.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Kuang
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
I said, "I'm home."
Everyone replied, "Welcome back."
The monkeys hug Kuang and present her with fruits and flowers one after another. Even if I can't understand the monkeys' language, I can tell that Kuang is adored by them.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Kuang
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Thank you, everyone.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Kuang
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
Sarukichi, Saruo, Sarunandez,
and everyone else all look like they're doing well. I'm so happy.
Do they each have a name? They all look the same...

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Kuang
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: That's not true. Sarukichi has a pretty face, and Saruo is a wild man. Look, Sarunandez is handsome with a tall nose.

Sarunandez blows a kiss towards me.
Is he really...handsome?

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Kuang
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
Huh? But I can't find Saruhiko...
I wonder what happened.
When Kuang mentions the name, the monkeys, who had been overjoyed earlier, fall silent. They exchange glances with each other and refuse to look at us.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Kuang
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Hey, is Saruhiko coming?

Kuang asks, and the monkeys let out muffled squeaks
with expressions that are hard to describe.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Kuang
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Yeah, yeah...What? Really? No way...
Kuang's expression becomes cloudy as she hears the explanation from the monkeys. What happened? What's wrong?

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Kuang
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
Okay...a monkey who was good friends with me
seems to have been kidnapped by some humans...
What? That's awful.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Kuang
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
I'll ask the monkeys more about Saruhiko.
Maybe I can find out where they took her.

Kuang then speaks to the monkeys that have gathered.
I want to help, but I feel frustrated because I can't understand their language.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Kuang
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: I see. No one saw her get taken away...
The only thing we found out was that Saruhiko was with a mature man from the city, but we don't know where he's been taken.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Kuang
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Anyway, let's get back to Flamarine!
We don't know where to go from here, but Kuang doesn't seem to be able to stay, so we hurriedly leave the island and return to Flamarine.
